Making Journal Styles
Styles are the part of LiveJournal that allows users to customize the look of their accounts.
Currently there are two types of style interfaces available to use, the older S1 which is very linear and dumb, and the newer S2 which features its own sort of programming language. A draft comparison of both systems can be found at
&ljp.styles.s1; &ljp.styles.s2;
